title: Page 4
content:
And oh, beautiful flakes, 

 The time now draws near; 

 But alas, see the earth, 

 How dark and how drear! 

 And on Christmas morning, 

 Why, do you not know, 

 The earth must be covered 

 All over with snow? 

 Then the little flake said, 

 With a brave bright air, 

 "I'm 

 going 

 to 

 get 

 ready 

 and 

 go 

 down 

 there!'

book.title: A Christmas Snowflake: A Rhyme for Children
book.description: 简介： 是一本关于圣诞节的英语儿童读物，是一本只有32页的短篇小说...
